result.execSummary:
The defendant David Kenneth Beach was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid to the Clerk of Court's Office. Bond to be applied first. Balance to be paid on a $25.00 per month payment plan beginning on 9/1/16 and on the 1st of each month thereafter until paid in full. Failure to pay will be warrant.
$200.00 DNA surcharge to be paid to the Clerk of Court's office to be paid on the $25.00 per month payment plan as set forth.
Eligible for expunction- Defendant must write letter to Court after 12 months requesting expunction.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. David Kenneth Beach

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

Defendant David K Beach in court with attorney Shelly Tomtschik.  Defendant David K Beach in custody.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 944am Ct 1-  G plea. CT accepts plea, finds G, enters JOC. 

SENTENCING: $265.60 fine/cost, $200.00 DNA surcharge. $250 in bond- to be applied. Balance to be on $25/mo PP beg 9/1/16 and 1st of e/m thereafter. 10 days in PCJ- time served. eligible for expunction- must write letter after 12 mos. 952am adj.
Jury trial on August 24, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant David K Beach in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Daniel Patrick Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 1054am bond cont. 1056am adj.  Jury trial scheduled for May 5, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Report in support of probable cause for arrest. Request for criminal complaint

10% CASH COMPONENT: MUST PAY $250 TO GET OUT OF JAIL.   Not to commit any new crimes.  Must appear at all future court appearances.  Defendant shall give written notice to the Clerk of this Court within 48 hours of any changes of address or telephone number.
